entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yellowknife
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:56 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -36.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yellowknife Airport 01:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -36.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -40.7°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 29.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
